verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H935>them<s%>, When ye come into the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H776>you<s%>, then shall the land <S%H7673>keep<s%> a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Six <S%H8337><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> thou shalt <S%H2232>sow<s%> thy <S%H7704>field<s%>, and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> thou shalt <S%H2168>prune<s%> thy <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, and <S%H622>gather<s%> in the fruits <S%H8393>thereof<s%>;

but in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> shall be a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of solemn <S%H7677>rest<s%> for the <S%H776>land<s%>, a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: thou shalt neither <S%H2232>sow<s%> thy <S%H7704>field<s%>, nor <S%H2168>prune<s%> thy <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>.

That which groweth of <S%H5599>itself<s%> of thy <S%H7105>harvest<s%> thou shalt not <S%H7114>reap<s%>, and the <S%H6025>grapes<s%> of thy <S%H5139>undressed<s%> vine thou shalt not <S%H1219>gather<s%>: it shall be a <S%H8141>year<s%> of solemn <S%H7677>rest<s%> for the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be for <S%H402>food<s%> for <S%H5650>you<s%>; for thee, and for thy servant and for thy <S%H519>maid<s%>, and for thy hired <S%H7916>servant<s%> and for thy <S%H8453>stranger<s%>, who sojourn with <S%H1481>thee<s%>.
And for thy <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and for the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> that are in thy <S%H776>land<s%>, shall all the <S%H8393>increase<s%> thereof be for <S%H398>food<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H5608>number<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> unto <S%H7651>thee<s%>, seven <S%H6471>times<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>; and there shall be unto thee the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%>, even <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

Then shalt thou send <S%H5674>abroad<s%> the <S%H8643>loud<s%> <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> on the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>; in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3725>atonement<s%> shall ye send <S%H5674>abroad<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> throughout all your <S%H776>land<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H6942>hallow<s%> the <S%H2572>fiftieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, and <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> <S%H1865>liberty<s%> throughout the <S%H776>land<s%> unto all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> <S%H3104>thereof<s%>: it shall be a jubilee unto <S%H7725>you<s%>; and ye shall return every <S%H376>man<s%> unto his <S%H272>possession<s%>, and ye shall <S%H7725>return<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> unto his <S%H4940>family<s%>.

A <S%H3104>jubilee<s%> shall that <S%H2572>fiftieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> be unto <S%H2232>you<s%>: ye shall not sow, neither <S%H7114>reap<s%> that which <S%H5599>groweth<s%> of itself in <S%H1219>it<s%>, nor gather the grapes in it of the undressed <S%H5139>vines<s%>.
For it is a <S%H3104>jubilee<s%>; it shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto <S%H398>you<s%>: ye shall eat the <S%H8393>increase<s%> thereof out of the <S%H7704>field<s%>.
In this <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubilee<s%> ye shall <S%H7725>return<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> unto his <S%H272>possession<s%>.

And if thou <S%H4376>sell<s%> <S%H4465>aught<s%> unto thy <S%H5997>neighbor<s%>, or <S%H7069>buy<s%> of thy <S%H5997>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%>, ye shall not <S%H3238>wrong<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H251>another<s%>.

According to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3104>jubilee<s%> thou shalt <S%H7069>buy<s%> of thy <S%H5997>neighbor<s%>, and according unto the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H8393>crops<s%> he shall sell unto <S%H4376>thee<s%>.

According <S%H6310><s%> to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%> thou shalt <S%H7235>increase<s%> the <S%H4736>price<s%> <S%H6310>thereof<s%>, and according to the <S%H4591>fewness<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%> thou shalt <S%H4591>diminish<s%> the <S%H4736>price<s%> of <S%H4557>it<s%>; for the number of the <S%H8393>crops<s%> doth he sell unto <S%H4376>thee<s%>.
And ye shall not <S%H3238>wrong<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5997>another<s%>; but thou shalt <S%H3372>fear<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>: for I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

Wherefore ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> mine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3427>them<s%>; and ye shall dwell in the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H983>safety<s%>.
And the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> its <S%H6529>fruit<s%>, and ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> your <S%H7648>fill<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein in <S%H983>safety<s%>.
And if ye shall <S%H559>say<s%>, What shall we <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>? <S%H2232>Behold<s%>, we shall not sow, nor <S%H622>gather<s%> in our <S%H8393>increase<s%>;

then I will <S%H6680>command<s%> my <S%H1293>blessing<s%> upon you in the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, and it shall bring <S%H6213>forth<s%> <S%H8393>fruit<s%> for the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H2232>sow<s%> the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H8393>fruits<s%>, the <S%H3465>old<s%> <S%H8671>store<s%>; until the ninth <S%H8141>year<s%>, until its <S%H8393>fruits<s%> come <S%H935>in<s%>, ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the old <S%H3465>store<s%>.
And the <S%H776>land<s%> shall not be <S%H4376>sold<s%> in <S%H6783>perpetuity<s%>; for the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H1616>mine<s%>: for ye are strangers and sojourners with <S%H1616>me<s%>.
And in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H272>possession<s%> ye shall <S%H5414>grant<s%> a <S%H1353>redemption<s%> for the <S%H776>land<s%>.

If thy <S%H251>brother<s%> be waxed <S%H4134>poor<s%>, and <S%H4376>sell<s%> some of his <S%H272>possession<s%>, then shall his <S%H7138>kinsman<s%> that is next unto him <S%H935>come<s%>, and shall <S%H1350>redeem<s%> that which his <S%H251>brother<s%> hath <S%H4465>sold<s%>.
And if a <S%H376>man<s%> have no one to <S%H1350>redeem<s%> <S%H3027>it<s%>, and he be waxed <S%H1767>rich<s%> and find sufficient to redeem <S%H4672>it<s%>;

then let him <S%H2803>reckon<s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H4465>sale<s%> <S%H7725>thereof<s%>, and restore the <S%H5736>overplus<s%> unto the <S%H376>man<s%> to whom he <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H7725>it<s%>; and he shall return unto his <S%H272>possession<s%>.

But if <S%H3027>he<s%> be not <S%H1767>able<s%> to <S%H4672>get<s%> it back for <S%H4465>himself<s%>, then that which he hath sold shall remain in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of him that hath <S%H7069>bought<s%> it until the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubilee<s%>: and in the <S%H3104>jubilee<s%> it shall go <S%H3318>out<s%>, and he shall <S%H7725>return<s%> unto his <S%H272>possession<s%>.

And if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4376>sell<s%> a <S%H4186>dwelling<s%> - <S%H1004>house<s%> in a <S%H2346>walled<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>, then he may <S%H1353>redeem<s%> it within a <S%H8552>whole<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> after it is <S%H4465>sold<s%>; for a full <S%H3117>year<s%> shall he have the right of <S%H1353>redemption<s%>.

And if it be not <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> within the <S%H4390>space<s%> of a <S%H8549>full<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, then the <S%H1004>house<s%> that is in the <S%H2346>walled<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H6965>made<s%> sure in <S%H6783>perpetuity<s%> to him that <S%H7069>bought<s%> <S%H1755>it<s%>, throughout his generations: it shall not go <S%H3318>out<s%> in the <S%H3104>jubilee<s%>.

But the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H2691>villages<s%> which have no <S%H2346>wall<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> them shall be <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> with the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of the <S%H776>country<s%>: they may be <S%H1353>redeemed<s%>, and they shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> in the <S%H3104>jubilee<s%>.

Nevertheless the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of their <S%H272>possession<s%>, may the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H1353>redeem<s%> at any <S%H5769>time<s%>.

And if one of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H1350>redeem<s%>, then the <S%H1004>house<s%> that was <S%H4465>sold<s%>, and the <S%H5892>city<s%> of his <S%H272>possession<s%>, shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> in the <S%H3104>jubilee<s%>; for the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> are their <S%H272>possession<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
But the <S%H7704>field<s%> of the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> of their <S%H5892>cities<s%> may not be <S%H4376>sold<s%>; for it is their <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H272>possession<s%>.

And if thy <S%H251>brother<s%> be waxed <S%H4134>poor<s%>, and his hand <S%H4131>fail<s%> with <S%H3027>thee<s%>; then thou shalt <S%H2388>uphold<s%> <S%H1616>him<s%>: as a stranger and a <S%H1616>sojourner<s%> shall he live with <S%H2416>thee<s%>.
Take <S%H3947><s%> thou no <S%H5392>interest<s%> of him or <S%H8636>increase<s%>, but <S%H3372>fear<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>; that thy <S%H251>brother<s%> may live with <S%H2416>thee<s%>.
Thou shalt not <S%H5414>give<s%> him thy <S%H3701>money<s%> upon <S%H5392>interest<s%>, nor <S%H5414>give<s%> him thy <S%H400>victuals<s%> for <S%H4768>increase<s%>.

I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, who brought you <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, and to be your <S%H430>God<s%>.

And if thy <S%H251>brother<s%> be waxed <S%H4134>poor<s%> with <S%H4376>thee<s%>, and sell himself unto <S%H5647>thee<s%>; thou shalt not make him to <S%H5656>serve<s%> as a <S%H5650>bond-servant<s%>.
As a hired <S%H7916>servant<s%>, and as a <S%H8453>sojourner<s%>, he shall be with <S%H5647>thee<s%>; he shall serve with thee unto the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubilee<s%>:

then shall he go <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H1121>thee<s%>, he and his children with <S%H7725>him<s%>, and shall return unto his own <S%H4940>family<s%>, and unto the <S%H272>possession<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers<s%> shall he <S%H7725>return<s%>.
For they are my <S%H5650>servants<s%>, whom I brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: they shall not be <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H4466>as<s%> <S%H5650>bondmen<s%>.
Thou shalt not <S%H7287>rule<s%> over him with <S%H6531>rigor<s%>, but shalt <S%H3372>fear<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>.

And as for thy <S%H5650>bondmen<s%>, and thy <S%H519>bondmaids<s%>, whom thou shalt <S%H1471>have<s%>; of the nations that are round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H7069>you<s%>, of them shall ye buy <S%H5650>bondmen<s%> and <S%H519>bondmaids<s%>.

Moreover of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H8453>strangers<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> among <S%H7069>you<s%>, of them shall ye buy, and of their <S%H4940>families<s%> that are with <S%H3205>you<s%>, which they have begotten in your <S%H776>land<s%>: and they shall be your <S%H272>possession<s%>.

And ye shall make them an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> for your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3423>you<s%>, to hold for a <S%H272>possession<s%>; of them shall ye take your <S%H5647>bondmen<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: but over your <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> ye shall not <S%H7287>rule<s%>, <S%H376>one<s%> over <S%H251>another<s%>, with <S%H6531>rigor<s%>.

And if a <S%H8453>stranger<s%> or <S%H1616>sojourner<s%> with <S%H3027>thee<s%> be waxed <S%H5381>rich<s%>, and thy <S%H251>brother<s%> be waxed <S%H4134>poor<s%> beside <S%H4376>him<s%>, and sell himself unto the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> or <S%H8453>sojourner<s%> with <S%H6133>thee<s%>, or to the stock of the <S%H1616>stranger<s%>'s <S%H4940>family<s%>;
after <S%H310><s%> that he is <S%H4376>sold<s%> he may <S%H1353>be<s%> <S%H259>redeemed<s%>: one of his <S%H251>brethren<s%> may redeem <S%H1350>him<s%>;

or his <S%H1730>uncle<s%>, or his <S%H1730>uncle<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>, may <S%H1350>redeem<s%> <S%H7607>him<s%>, or any that is nigh of <S%H1320>kin<s%> unto him of his <S%H4940>family<s%> may <S%H1350>redeem<s%> <S%H5381>him<s%>; or if he be waxed rich, he may <S%H1350>redeem<s%> <S%H3027>himself<s%>.

And he shall <S%H2803>reckon<s%> with him that <S%H7069>bought<s%> him from the <S%H8141>year<s%> that he <S%H4376>sold<s%> himself to him unto the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubilee<s%>: and the <S%H3701>price<s%> of his <S%H4465>sale<s%> shall be according unto the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%>; according to the <S%H3117>time<s%> of a hired servant shall he be with <S%H7916>him<s%>.

If there be yet <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, <S%H6310>according<s%> unto them he shall give <S%H7725>back<s%> the price of his <S%H1353>redemption<s%> out of the <S%H3701>money<s%> that he was bought <S%H4736>for<s%>.

And if there <S%H7604>remain<s%> but <S%H4592>few<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> unto the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubilee<s%>, then he shall <S%H2803>reckon<s%> with <S%H6310>him<s%>; according unto his <S%H8141>years<s%> shall he give <S%H7725>back<s%> the price of his <S%H1353>redemption<s%>.
As a <S%H7916>servant<s%> hired <S%H8141>year<s%> by year shall he be with <S%H7287>him<s%>: he shall not rule with <S%H6531>rigor<s%> over him in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%>.
And if he be not <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> by these <S%H3318>means<s%>, then he shall go out in the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubilee<s%>, <S%H1121>he<s%>, and his children with him.

For unto me the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H5650>servants<s%>; they are my <S%H5650>servants<s%> whom I brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.
